description: Xero is an online accounting software platform designed for small businesses and accountants to manage finances efficiently.
name: xero
title: Xero

properties.description: Contact to create the bill for.
properties.name: ContactID
properties.label: Contact

properties.description: Date of the bill. If no date is specified, the current date will be used.
properties.name: Date
properties.label: Date

properties.description: Date bill is due.If no date is specified, the current date will be used.
properties.name: DueDate
properties.label: Due Date

properties.description: Currency that bill is raised in.
properties.name: CurrencyCode
properties.label: Currency

properties.description: Full name of a contact or organisation.
properties.name: Name
properties.label: Name

properties.description: Unique account number to identify, reference and search for the contact.
properties.name: AccountNumber
properties.label: Account number

options.description: The Contact is active and can be used in transactions.
options.label: Active

options.description: The Contact is archived and can no longer be used in transactions.
options.label: Archived

options.description: The Contact is the subject of a GDPR erasure request and can no longer be used in transctions.
options.label: GDPR erasure request

properties.label: Tax number
